description.narrative:
Long term goal
"Mama Cash's long-term goal is to support the collective action of women, girls, and trans and intersex people who organise to liberate societies from injustice and build feminist realities and futures. We do this by mobilising and moving resources to feminist organising around the world and supporting feminist movements to be autonomous, inclusive, pluralist and resilient"
Outcomes
The Strategic Plan has the following outcomes:
Movement outcomes (as per the results framework)
1. Strengthened movement actors. Movement actors have built their knowledge and skills to contribute meaningfully to movements making change.
2. Coordinated movement actors. Movement actors have mobilised and coordinated their work within and across allied movements.
3. Making change. Movement actors will have created, advanced or blocked changes.
4. Feminist movements are autonomous, inclusive, pluralist and resilient.
Money results fundraising outcomes (as per the results framework)
1. More funds secured.
2. Better funds secured.
3. Mama Cash has build its base of support with individuals.
5. More money available to feminist movements.
6. More funding accessible to feminist movements.
7. Mama Cash and women's funds have successful long term partnerships.
8. Funders recognise women's funds as relevant actors in the funding ecosystem
In addition to the above outcomes, the intervention also aims at a number of internal outcomes for Mama Cash's own organisation, for example:
1. Supervisory board, management board and staff are reflective of the feminist movements we work with.
6. Learning and acting on what we learn are integral components of our work.
7. Annual CO2 emissions are reduced (compared to the 2018-2019) by 50% by 2030.

Stödet som är ett kärnstöd för implementering av Mama Cash:s strategisk plan 2015-2019. Planen omfattar följande komponenter: 1)stöd till mindre och medelstor kvinnorättsorganisationer; 2) kvinnorättsfonder; samt 3) kommunikation och resursmobilisering. I förslaget ingår även att stärka Mama Cash som organisation.

The core support is for implementation of MamaCash's strategic plan 2015-2019. The plan covers the following components: 1) Fund and support women's & girls' human rights organisations; 2) Build a strong global architecture of women's funds; and 3) Communicate their core message, and promote women's and girls' rights, learning, and community-building. Organisational dev is also part of the plan.

sector.narrative: Women’s rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

tag.narrative: 5.1 - Avskaffa alla former av diskriminering av alla kvinnor och flickor överallt
5.1 - End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere.
5.2 - Avskaffa alla former av våld mot alla kvinnor och flickor i det offentliga och privata rummet, inklusive människohandel, sexuellt utnyttjande och andra typer av exploatering.
5.2 - Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.

5.6 - Ensure universal access to sexual and reproductive health and reproductive rights as agreed in accordance with the Programme of Action of the International Conference on Population and Development and the Beijing Platform for Action and the outcome documents of their review conferences.

5.6 - Säkerställa allmän tillgång till sexuell och reproduktiv hälsa och reproduktiva rättigheter i enlighet med överenskommelserna i handlingsprogrammet från den internationella konferensen om befolkning och utveckling, Pekingplattformen samt slutdokumenten från respektive översynskonferenser.

5.a - Genomföra reformer för att ge kvinnor lika rätt till ekonomiska resurser, möjlighet att äga och kontrollera mark och andra former av egendom samt tillgång till finansiella tjänster, arv och naturresurser, i enlighet med nationell lagstiftning

5.a - Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws.
5.c - Adopt and strengthen sound policies and enforceable legislation for the promotion of gender equality and the empowerment of all women and girls at all levels.
5.c - Anta och stärka välgrundad politik och genomförbar lagstiftning för att främja jämställdhet och öka alla kvinnors och flickors egenmakt på alla nivåer
